files.patch:
@@ -157,1 +157,3 @@
-#if defined(_WINDOWS)
+#if defined(_ALLBSD_SOURCE) || defined(_GNU_SOURCE)
+    UTC_to_local = -(time_struct.tm_gmtoff);
+#elif defined(_WINDOWS)
@@ -161,0 +163,3 @@
+#else
+    UTC_to_local = timezone;
+#endif
@@ -162,0 +167,2 @@
+    // tm_gmtoff already includes adjustment for daylight saving
+#if !defined(_ALLBSD_SOURCE) && !defined(_GNU_SOURCE)
@@ -167,3 +174,0 @@
-#else
-    // tm_gmtoff already includes adjustment for daylight saving
-    UTC_to_local = -(time_struct.tm_gmtoff);
